original_text: And the scribes and the Pharisees watched him, to see whether he would heal on the Sabbath, so that they might find a reason to accuse him.
korean_text: 서기관과 바리새인들이 예수를 고발할 증거를 찾으려 하여 안식일에 병을 고치시는가 엿보니

sentences.original_text: And the scribes and the Pharisees watched him
to see whether he would heal on the Sabbath
sentences.korean_translation: 안식일에 그가 병을 고치는지 보기 위해

sentences.original_text: so that they might find a reason to accuse him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그를 고발할 이유를 찾기 위해
